title: Apple Pay Partner Marketing Manager EMEIA
summary: Apple is looking for a marketing manager to develop and support marketing programmes for Apple Pay and Wallet. This role is responsible for working with issuing banks to drive consumer awareness and education of Apple Pay.
description: Manage partner banks’ marketing relationships to drive consumer adoption and use of Apple Pay. Be aware of market dynamics and regulatory environment effecting payments and impact on customer experience and behaviour. Partner with regional and international teams to identify trends and insight and define marketing needs. Partner with Marcom to support the creative development, review and approval for issuer comms following Apple Guidelines.
preferred_qualifications: Strong analytical capabilities to turn complex data into useful insights. Self-starting and self-directed with focus on results. English fluent and additional languages are desirable (specifically Arabic and/or French)
